review: Dr Rupali Bhatia listens with empathy and offers great medical advice. I took my mom for menopause issues and she recommended dietary changes to fulfill her nutrition needs. She gives only the medicines that are absolutely essential for the healing process. And i find that really great. I would highly recommend her. She is an amazing Gyneacologist.
One of the brilliant doctors we have consulted during our time of pregnancy, she's very informative and polite.We would definitely recommend her to every couple on their journey :)
